entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
